hero.title: Hello, my name is
hero.subtitle: Kevin Parra.
hero.description: I am a Frontend Developer from Colombia with over 7 years of experience in leading and developing advanced web and mobile applications.

container1.title: Who am I?
container1.text1: I am a technical lead and frontend developer specialized in creating user-centered and data-driven solutions.
container1.text2: With a track record of leadership, I have delivered projects that impact global users, specializing in React, React Native, Next.js, and Node.js.
container1.text3: Additionally, I have advanced experience in creating immersive 3D experiences, using libraries like Three.js and applying them in augmented and virtual reality contexts.
container1.text4: I have recently worked with these technologies:

skills.title: My Skills.
skills.text1: I possess skills in a wide range of tools, languages, programs, and methodologies focused on modern and efficient development.
skills.text5: Intermediate: Competent experience with several completed projects.

about.copy: The process of creating and innovating is a passion I share with the digital world's artists.

footer.copy: Shall we chat? I'll buy the coffee.
